name: Zombies shooter (Minhvo2007)
description:
Press W or UP ARROW to move

Press A or LEFT ARROW to turn left.

Press D or RIGHT ARROW to turn left

Press S or DOWN ARROW to go reverse

-------------More down here---------------------------------------

Shoot by pressing the space bar.

Press flag or "r" to play again

Press "g" to throw a grenade

Collect ammo in case of "out of ammo"
